original_text: So you must stand strongly. This is God's armour that you must wear: God's true message will be like a belt that you tie round your body. Always do what is right. That will be like a metal shirt that you wear to keep your body safe.
korean_text: 그런즉 서서 진리로 너희 허리 띠를 띠고 의의 호심경을 붙이고

sentences.original_text: This is God's armour that you must wear:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 네가 입어야 할 하나님의 갑옷이다:

sentences.original_text: God's true message will be like a belt
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 진리의 말씀은 허리띠와 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that you tie round your body.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 몸에 두르는 허리띠와 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That will be like a metal shirt
that you wear to keep your body safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 몸을 보호하기 위해 입는 금속 갑옷과 같을 것이다.
